name: Mango Tree
description: A fast-growing tropical tree that produces delicious, juicy mangoes during summer. Its dense green canopy provides ample shade.

name: Guava Tree
description: Hardy and productive, guava trees yield vitamin-rich fruits and thrive in warm, humid climates.

name: Banana Plant
description: A fast-growing tropical plant that produces bunches of sweet bananas and adds lush greenery to gardens.

name: Rose Plant
description: A classic flowering plant admired for its vibrant blooms and pleasant fragrance, perfect for ornamental gardens.

name: Hibiscus Plant
description: A tropical shrub known for its large, colorful flowers that attract pollinators and enhance garden beauty.

name: Neem Tree
description: A traditional medicinal tree known for its air-purifying qualities and natural pest-repellent properties.

name: Amla Tree
description: Produces vitamin-C-rich fruits used in traditional remedies to improve immunity and overall wellness.

name: Banyan Tree
description: Majestic and long-lived, banyan trees offer expansive shade and become living landmarks in communities.

name: Rain Tree
description: A large, umbrella-shaped tree that provides excellent shade and improves soil fertility through nitrogen fixation.

name: Teak Tree
description: Valued for its strong, durable wood used in furniture and shipbuilding, teak trees are a key timber species.

name: Mahogany Tree
description: A premium hardwood tree prized for its deep reddish-brown color and resistance to decay.

name: Pine Tree
description: An evergreen conifer that stays lush throughout the year, offering both shade and a calming forest aroma.

name: Eucalyptus Tree
description: A tall, aromatic tree with silvery leaves, commonly used for essential oils and as a natural windbreak.

name: Ashoka Tree
description: An elegant ornamental tree with fragrant orange-red flowers, symbolizing love and peace in Indian culture.

name: Palm Tree
description: A tropical tree with slender trunks and fan-like leaves, ideal for resorts, gardens, and streetscapes.

name: Bamboo Plant
description: Fast-growing and versatile, bamboo is used for furniture, fencing, and landscaping while helping reduce carbon dioxide.

name: Money Plant
description: A low-maintenance indoor climber believed to bring prosperity and freshness to home interiors.

name: Bougainvillea
description: A bright flowering climber that covers walls and fences with vibrant pink and magenta hues.

name: Lotus
description: A sacred aquatic flower that symbolizes purity and beauty, commonly grown in ponds and water gardens.

name: Water Lily
description: A floating aquatic plant with beautiful blooms, adding tranquility and color to ponds and lakes.
